name: HTML
description: A way to define meaning and structure of web content.

name: CSS
description: A core language of the open web; it is a stylesheet language used to describe the presentation of a document written HTML.

name: SASS/SCSS
description: A modern approach for applying style to the presentation layer. My preference is to use the SCSS syntax. It is a superset of CSS, and is easy to understand.

name: JavaScript
description: Exploring the behaviour layer with ES5 and ES6, JavaScript is programming language primarily used in the browser.

name: React
description: A modern JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

name: Gatsby
description: A modern framework combining React, GraphQL and Webpack to build performant frontends.

name: NPM
description: A way to manage JavaScript packages via a CLI and their software registry.

name: Composer
description: An awesome tool to manage dependency management in PHP.

name: Drupal
description: The best open DXP in the world.

name: Docksal
description: Docksal is ace. It's an all-purpose web-development environment based on Docker and Docker Compose.

name: Git
description: The go-to choice for version control.

name: BASH
description: A Unix shell and a command language interpreter.
